document_data.name: Courage
document_data.mainbody: '''Courage''' was an [[enchantment]] spell that [[crusader]]s and battle clerics could use to boost the morale of up to 200 individuals organized in a fighting unit.
document_data.Effects: This spell lasted until sundown or until the unit was faced with a situation that challenged their morale, whichever came first. Multiple castings of this spell did not stack, i.e., no more than one ''courage'' spell could be active on a unit at a time.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell required a small cube of [[cast iron]].
